column6: The committee agreed that a three year term at the value of $3,000 each year is appropriate and that the applicant is now in year two of the three year term.

The Committee noted that this was a good application and supports the request for the full amount.  Discussion ensued around the fact that the majority of the funds would be used to transport the students to the learning site in Delta.  It was felt that if travel wasn’t supported (as per Grant Guidelines)  there could be an accessibility/ equality issue - dividing students on who could participate.

The Committee did not recommend support for this application.  Main concerns were related to public safety around medicinal herbs, maintenance of the plots & fundraising.  It was felt that the organization should provide more details in the application (e.g., incl. a full plan) & apply again next year.

The Committee was supportive of this event and recommends to cover the full cost.  The applicant's application was more clear this year compared to last year.  The applicant should have provided their own volunteer time in the "in-kind" section to show the full cost of implementing an one-day event. Group should consider broadening their support.
The Committee was supportive of this initiative and felt that it presents good value for money, given it is in Queens Park.  Support for the full request is recommended.
